channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Tower
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Tower

item.title: CVE-2019-3869|2024-08-04T19:19:18.595Z -- red%20hat -- tower
item.description: When running Tower before 3.4.3 on OpenShift or Kubernetes, application credentials are exposed to playbook job runs via environment variables. A malicious user with the ability to write playbooks could use this to gain administrative privileges.
